sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.text: By accessing or using the Tarbiyah Learning Academy School Management System (SMS), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service. These terms apply to all users of the platform, including parents, teachers, administrators, and students.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
sections.text: Tarbiyah Learning Academy SMS is an educational technology platform that provides school management services including student record management, academic progress tracking, parent-teacher communication, attendance management, and administrative functions. The service is designed to enhance educational operations and facilitate communication within the school community.
items: Student Management: Record keeping, academic progress tracking, and attendance management
Communication Tools: Secure messaging between parents, teachers, and administrators
Administrative Functions: Class scheduling, grade management, and reporting
Educational Support: Academic progress monitoring and educational resource access
